RelatedSentence: The Affordable Care Act was meant to make health insurance coverage more accessible to consumers throughout the country , but in some cases it has had a somewhat opposite effect .
The Affordable Care Act was meant to make health insurance coverage more accessible to consumers throughout the country , but in some cases it has had a somewhat opposite effect .
Some of the provisions of the law have encouraged insurers to re-evaluate their relationships with health care providers , making changes to their coverage networks in order to cut costs .
